comment: She is a wonderful lady and willing to help, but the structure of the class is messy. The department sets up the internship classes in a certain way and she didn't understand it so she changed a lot of the expectations. If you talk with her about any confusion she finds a way to help. She is entertaining.
rating_tags: ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS--GRADED BY FEW THINGS

comment: This professor is very unorganized and not alot of help. It took her months to grade our midterm and she overlooked a few papers of mine and didn't grade them for a month and gave me a failing grade because she didn't read the entire paper. Do not take this professor, class was easy but very very disorganized. The class taught ourselves the subject
rating_tags: ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS--GRADED BY FEW THINGS--Caring

comment: Sweet lady, but she is really all over the place. Unclear about what is expected, does not stick to the syllabus. Attendance is mandatory but she doesn't really do much in class, just makes you work together or watch videos. If you want to learn, I would not take her.
Ive never had a professor who had to actually ask her students when something is due. She has no idea what's going on in her own class.

Dr. Hicks-Coolick is all over the place. She is a sweet lady, but not clear about her expectations! She can't stick to her syllabus to save her life. This class was sometimes fun and usually interesting, but I'm a more structured person so she wasn't my favorite professor as far as teaching style goes.

She is overall a pretty good teacher. Sometimes there is so much going on I her class, it can be overwhelming so keep an eye on the syllabus. There were several times papers had to be  looked at again after she graded bc of it being marked wrong when its right, but it is an interesting class. I would take her again.

The SWEETEST. Dr. Anne calls us her little chickens, haha. It is true that we get far off topic on tangent conversations, so we aren't always on track. But you have the syllabus for a reason - stay up on what is expect of you. She makes material so easy to comprehend, gives ample opportunity for success, & the info sticks. Dr. Anne is great.

She is awesome. The most important thing about going to school is learning. And I have never learned more in one class than I did in Dr. Anne's. She is amazing and I would recommend taking her to anyone.

I kind of feel bad saying this because she's really nice, but I think it's time for her to retire. She has NO time management skills and we wasted a lot of time because she won't shut someone up if they're going on and ON. With that said, there's no reason you can't make an A or B in class because she gives you easy assignments. Tests are iffy.

You never know what to expect on exams, because she can't move through powerpoints or follow the syllabus to save her life. Difficult time communicating simple topics. She's nice and sweet, but would not recommend the class for non HS majors, if that makes sense. As an aside, she allowed 2 or 3 students to waste class time with stupid comments.

She's awesome. I took this as a filler class and she's made it great. It's really easy. Attendance is mandatory but it's not bad to sit through. 20 hours of community service required throughout semester. A few tests which are easy, and a take home midterm. They're all much easier than they sound. REALLY nice, very helpful and understanding.
AWESOME TEACHER!!!!! HER TESTS ARE SUPER EASY!!! MID-TERM = QUIZES BEFORE...FINAL = ALL QUIZES.. FOR THE MOST PART WORD FOR WORD !!! GREAT TEACHER!! HELPS GPA ALOT!
Easy A

This was a fairly easy class. she does take a grade on attendance but half of the time you dont really need to be there. she is very helpful but gets off topic a lot in class. there is a required 20 hrs of volunteer work so if you cant do it, dont sign up. otherwise, easy A

Dr Anne is wonderful. very enjoyable class, easy A, she is helpful and she basically gives you the test questions before the test. I learned a lot and actually enjoyed going to class! Highly recommend Dr Anne!
No Comments
Dr Anne is awesome! I thouroughly enjoyed her class! I learned alot! I would highly reccomend her to anyone!
really nice
great teacher, very understanding!
Good teacher but at times a little conceited and condescending

Dr. Ann has never taught freshman seminar before, and she seemed to have trouble with it.  She reemed us out for not knowing how to use WebCT, and then realized she was the one who was supposed to teach it to us. I ended up unhappy.
Dr. Anne really cares about her students and she is an awesome teacher!
